verses.text: Every \w wise|strong="H2454"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w buildeth|strong="H1129"\w* her \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: but the \w foolish|strong="H0200"\w* plucketh it \w down|strong="H2040"\w* with her \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

He that \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* in his \w uprightness|strong="H3476"\w* \w feareth|strong="H3373"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but \add he that is\add* \w perverse|strong="H3868"\w* in his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w despiseth|strong="H0959"\w* him.

In the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w foolish|strong="H0191"\w* \add is\add* a \w rod|strong="H2415"\w* of \w pride|strong="H1346"\w*: but the \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* shall \w preserve|strong="H8104"\w* them.

Where no \w oxen|strong="H0504"\w* \add are\add*, the \w crib|strong="H0018"\w* \add is\add* \w clean|strong="H1249"\w*: but \w much|strong="H7230"\w* \w increase|strong="H8393"\w* \add is\add* by the \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* of the \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*.

A \w faithful|strong="H0529"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* will not \w lie|strong="H3577"\w*: but a \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* will \w utter|strong="H6315"\w* \w lies|strong="H3576"\w*.

A \w scorner|strong="H3887"\w* \w seeketh|strong="H1245"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, and \add findeth it\add* not: but \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \add is\add* \w easy|strong="H7043"\w* unto him that \w understandeth|strong="H0995"\w*.

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* from the \w presence|strong="H5048"\w* of a \w foolish|strong="H3684"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, when thou \w perceivest|strong="H3045"\w* not \add in him\add* the \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* of \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.

The \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* of the \w prudent|strong="H6175"\w* \add is\add* to \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*: but the \w folly|strong="H0200"\w* of \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* \add is\add* \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*.
\w Fools|strong="H0191"\w* make a \w mock|strong="H3887"\w* at \w sin|strong="H0817"\w*: but among the \w righteous|strong="H3477"\w* \add there is\add* \w favour|strong="H7522"\w*.

The \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* his \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w bitterness|strong="H4787"\w*; and a \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* doth not \w intermeddle|strong="H6148"\w* with his \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*.\f + \fr 14.10 \ft his own…: Heb. the bitterness of his soul\f*

The \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall be \w overthrown|strong="H8045"\w*: but the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* shall \w flourish|strong="H6524"\w*.

There \w is|strong="H3426"\w* a \w way|strong="H1870"\w* which seemeth \w right|strong="H3477"\w* \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, but the \w end|strong="H0319"\w* thereof \add are\add* the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

Even in \w laughter|strong="H7814"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is \w sorrowful|strong="H3510"\w*; and the \w end|strong="H0319"\w* of that \w mirth|strong="H8057"\w* \add is\add* \w heaviness|strong="H8424"\w*.

The \w backslider|strong="H5472"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall be \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* with his own \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*: and a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add shall be satisfied\add* from himself.

The \w simple|strong="H6612"\w* \w believeth|strong="H0539"\w* every \w word|strong="H1697"\w*: but the \w prudent|strong="H6175"\w* \add man\add* looketh \w well|strong="H0995"\w* to his \w going|strong="H0838"\w*.

A \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add man\add* \w feareth|strong="H3373"\w*, and \w departeth|strong="H5493"\w* from \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: but the \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* \w rageth|strong="H5674"\w*, and is \w confident|strong="H0982"\w*.

\add He that is\add* \w soon|strong="H7116"\w* \w angry|strong="H0639"\w* \w dealeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w foolishly|strong="H0200"\w*: and a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of wicked \w devices|strong="H4209"\w* is \w hated|strong="H8130"\w*.
The \w simple|strong="H6612"\w* \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* \w folly|strong="H0200"\w*: but the \w prudent|strong="H6175"\w* are \w crowned|strong="H3803"\w* with \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.

The \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w bow|strong="H7817"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; and the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* at the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*.

The \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* is \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* even of his own \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*: but the \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \add hath\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w friends|strong="H0157"\w*.\f + \fr 14.20 \ft the rich…: Heb. many are the lovers of the rich\f*

He that \w despiseth|strong="H0936"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* \w sinneth|strong="H2398"\w*: but he that hath \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* on the \w poor|strong="H6035"\w*, \w happy|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* he.

Do they not \w err|strong="H8582"\w* that \w devise|strong="H2790"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*? but \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* and \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* \add shall be\add* to them that \w devise|strong="H2790"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.
In all \w labour|strong="H6089"\w* there is \w profit|strong="H4195"\w*: but the \w talk|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \add tendeth\add* only to \w penury|strong="H4270"\w*.

The \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* of the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add is\add* their \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*: \add but\add* the \w foolishness|strong="H0200"\w* of \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* \add is\add* \w folly|strong="H0200"\w*.

A \w true|strong="H0571"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w delivereth|strong="H5337"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*: but a \w deceitful|strong="H4820"\w* \add witness\add* \w speaketh|strong="H6315"\w* \w lies|strong="H3577"\w*.

In the \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w strong|strong="H5797"\w* \w confidence|strong="H4009"\w*: and his \w children|strong="H1121"\w* shall have a place of \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w*.

The \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* a \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, to \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from the \w snares|strong="H4170"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

In the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add is\add* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w honour|strong="H1927"\w*: but in the \w want|strong="H0657"\w* of \w people|strong="H3816"\w* \add is\add* the \w destruction|strong="H4288"\w* of the \w prince|strong="H7333"\w*.

\add He that is\add* \w slow|strong="H0750"\w* to \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \add is\add* of \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*: but \add he that is\add* \w hasty|strong="H7116"\w* of \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w exalteth|strong="H7311"\w* \w folly|strong="H0200"\w*.\f + \fr 14.29 \ft hasty…: Heb. short of spirit\f*

A \w sound|strong="H4832"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add is\add* the \w life|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*: but \w envy|strong="H7068"\w* the \w rottenness|strong="H7538"\w* of the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*.

He that \w oppresseth|strong="H6231"\w* the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w reproacheth|strong="H2778"\w* his \w Maker|strong="H6213"\w*: but he that \w honoureth|strong="H3513"\w* him hath \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* on the \w poor|strong="H0034"\w*.

The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* is driven \w away|strong="H1760"\w* in his \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*: but the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* hath \w hope|strong="H2620"\w* in his \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

\w Wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w resteth|strong="H5117"\w* in the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of him that hath \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w*: but \add that which is\add* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* is made \w known|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w Righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w exalteth|strong="H7311"\w* a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*: but \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \add is\add* a \w reproach|strong="H2617"\w* to any \w people|strong="H3816"\w*.\f + \fr 14.34 \ft to any…: Heb. to nations\f*

The \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w favour|strong="H7522"\w* \add is\add* toward a \w wise|strong="H7919"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*: but his \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w* is \add against\add* him that causeth \w shame|strong="H0954"\w*.
